EmailTemplate.name: Disclosure Difficulty
EmailTemplate.subject: Difficulty with Disclosure - NCS The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Apologies that the last email did not have the correct attachment. This was an error in the system, it is being looked into and as soon as it is corrected I will re-send.
Thank you for your diligence and on-going commitment.
Warm Regards,
Sherry Kimball Senior Staffing Associate for Support Workers The Challenge London Waterloo Office sherry.kimball@the-challenge.org 07785 623400 0203 6918723
